review.body: Couldn't get into it.

Polar bear shifter Kyle Frost (love that name) is a tortured army vet but it wasn’t his military service that left him that way. He has a secret past that he shares with his two best friends from prep school. Dr. Kelly Malone knows that something plagues Kyle’s sleep and his sanity from her days...

book.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Box Set (The Spiderwick Chronicles, #1-5)
book.publisher: Simon & Schuster Books for Young Readers

review.body: My childhood evolved around these books.
I did not like.

book.title: Syn: Sex Is Syn, Love Is Pain

review.body:
Damn!

Syn had a ruff life and didn't know how to handle when someone cared for her other then her girls!!! Please let Parker find her!! A must read!!!
Did not like
Terrible. Couldn't finish it.

book.title: Bear and Squirrel Are Friends . . . Yes, Really!

review.body: Reminds me of Mo Willems style. Very amusing, very clever and very entertaining. Much better book than other books on list on friendship. This celebrates the differences you may have with your buddy. The text is still simple enough for early readers. Top pick!
I did not like

book.title: The Boundless
book.publisher: Simon & Schuster Books for Young Readers

review.body: A very interesting story! But a little slow in some parts.
I love the way everyone that Madlenka meets sees a different dog at the end of her leash. His drawings of the different breeds is right on.

This book was cute, but there wasn't a whole lot to set it apart from the hundreds of other "new big sibling" books out there. The illustrations were cute, and I liked how it addressed the jealousy issue without dismissing it - but also talked about the things older siblings can do that little on...
Dated. Reminded me of a bad Disney movie.
2016-2017 Truman Final Nominee

I was super excited about this book. Unfortunately I think it made my expectations too high. Guinevere wanted to be a very strong character but she seems very weak. I would think that with all the stories there are of her she would be a lot more confident.

book.title: The Three-Body Problem (Remembrance of Earth’s Past, #1)

review.body: coudnt finish it...i dont understand why everyone loves this book so much.
I was disappointed that Czechoslovakia was not included in Madlenka's trip around the world of New York because after all Peter Sis is from there!
2016-2017 Truman Final Nominee

book.title: Culture Sketches: Case Studies in Anthropology

review.body: Soooo interesting! I love these case studies.

This is not my preferred reading, but this is a well constructed, well written book. You can understand the emotions of the characters and the sad, poignant moments are well written, tissues required! Well worth reading, and it feels like a very long book.
